howTo.heading: How can we transfer large files easily from windows to Iphone?
steps: Simply tap the Add File option and choose a large file from Windows.
Get a unique link or QR code to transfer the file securely.
Share this link or scan the QR code from your iPhone.

faqs.question: How can I send large files (JPG, MP4, MP3, PDF, etc.) from Windows to iPhone?
faqs.answer: You can quickly and securely send large files from Windows to iPhone using FileDropShare.

faqs.question: Is it necessary to pay to transfer large files from one device to another?
faqs.answer: No, there is no need to pay a single penny to transfer large files. We provide an absolutely free service.

faqs.question: Do I have to download any app to use FileDropShare?
faqs.answer: No, you don’t have to download any app to share large files. To use FileDropShare, you only need a browser with an internet connection
